ygData.subject: Moving on
ygData.msgSnippet: I made level 10 last night.  It was the last thing I did before I got offline.  I love the sound it makes when
ygData.messageBody:
I made level 10 last night. <waits for applause and
cheering to settle donw> It was the last thing I did
before I got offline. I love the sound it makes when
you level!
From 5th - 10th I have remained exclusively in Neriak
and Nektulos Forrest. Needless to say I am now bored
with skeles and wandering the zone looking for kodies.
Granted, it is a very safe place for me to wander in
now. :) Any suggestions on new hunting grounds for a
solo 10th level SK? I lag VERY badly in Freeport and
Greater Fey, too much "activity" with merchants and
spells makes my screen lock up. So do the Inns in the
Desert and Commonlands. :( I was debating on tying out
Lavastrom, but with my save vs Fire attacks at a
whopping 5 I will take quite a beating I think. I need
to go back to Grobb to train my Bash skill (didn't
realize I hadn't trained in it yet. Doh!), Dodge, and
Bind Wound so I was debating on Upper Guk, or tryng the
further reaches of the Innothule swamp. North Ro is an
option too. <shrug> But I am tired of that desert. Can
you get to the boat in Freeport from under the docks
without seeing a guard? If I can then I was debating on
OOT. Is all of OOT a high level zone or just parts of it?
I really want to go to Faydwer and take on the Nitebrite
Sisters. How do you increase faction with Dwarves in
Kaladim so as not to be KoS as a Troll SK?
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Beld Demonblade,
The HT advise was very informative. I will use it from
now on like that. :)
Since you are obviously a very expeienced SK can you
write up how you went about avoiding guards, increasing
factions (and which groups) and such as an SK?
I do not want to wander zones in "Panic Mode" if there
is a simple way around it. The Wood Elves of Lesser and
Greater Fey are my main concern after getting Dwarves
out of the way. :)
This assumes that it is possible of course. Heh, can
you imagine going to Rivervale and getting the Healing
ring from the Sherrif or Deputy? Forgot it's name and
who gives it, sorry. :) "I am one with the wall." heh.
Thanks in advance.

--
Cronik
Left Hand of Thule the Pain Bringer
9th Season Troll SK
Bertoxxulous

"Greenbloods jus be Froglok trick. Smash'm and dey
blood same color a Froglok. Me smash'm Greenblood
for Thule. Thule make Cronik big feared. Make
smash'm fun."
